description: Screening has been stopped and some treatments will be shortened, the island's health minister says.
title: Coronavirus: Isle of Man cancer screening and treatment affected by pandemic
title_page: Coronavirus: Isle of Man cancer screening and treatment affected by pandemic - BBC News
maintext: Patients receiving treatment in the UK would be risk assessed as the department works out "what treatments we can deliver on island and what we need to do to help them", he added.
